job.title: Machine Learning Software Engineer / Senior - Lead
job.description: An ecommerce tech company in Chicago is looking to bring on a hybrid Software amp Machine Learning Engineer to work on a variety of computer vision and NLP projects The role is looking for someone who is very comfortable in Python programming and building out Machine Learning models from scratch as well as someone who can help deploy their models into productionbrbrThis role needs someone who not only has used Machine learning but also someone who comes from a strong computer engineering background to be able to work closely with the software developers on the full life cycle of the data projectsbrbrThis is a true hybrid role between engineering and Machine LearningDeep Learning so if youre looking to take on the next step in your career make sure to apply todaybrbrstronguRequired Skills amp Experiencebrustrongul li4 years professional experience in building web applications backend infrastructure data pipelines and or machine learning modelsli
